flashcardAnswer: Java Development Kit. It includes everything including compiler, Java Runtime Environment (JRE), java debuggers, java docs, etc.
Java Virtual Machine. It is responsible for executing the bytecode generated by the compiler.
boolean, byte, char, short, int, long, float, double

flashcardQuestion: Describe what the 'private' access modifier does.
flashcardAnswer: Specifies that the member can only be accessed in its own class
